title: HomeEscape Reveals Infographic on Benefits of Vacation Rentals
text:
MIAMI, FL (9/11/2015) HomeEscape unveils its latest infographic detailing the benefits of selecting a vacation rental over a traditional hotel.
“We are always thinking of creative ways to educate our users about the benefits of vacation rentals,” says Avi Vaknin CEO of HomeEscape. “Vacation rentals save on lots of costs – making vacations more affordable and fun,” he said.
Vacation days have a habit of not being used, especially in US markets. HomeEscape , the web’s fastest growing vacation listing and rental site, wants to reverse that trend.
“The ethos of our company is for people to get out and explore the world. We’ve made our site a free platform so users don’t have to worry about the costs – a common concern that prevents travelers from booking their vacation,” remarked Vaknin.
About HomeEscape: Headquartered in Miami, Florida, HomeEscape connects homeowners and property managers with travelers who seek the space, value and amenities of vacation rental homes as an alternative to hotels. With detailed property descriptions, photos and list of amenities and nearby attractions, HomeEscape makes it easy to find and compare properties all over the world.
